extension.description:
AdGuard Home is a network-wide software for blocking ads and tracking. After you set it up, it'll cover ALL your home devices, and you don't need any client-side software for that.
***Port 53 has to be open on LibreELEC for this addon to work. ***Ports 67 and 68 have to be open if DHCP is enabled.
During first install, access http://LibreELEC-IP:3000 to set up AdGuardHome.
This is a docker addon brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
